channel.title: [Client] Someone's username and password show up! [Help]
channel.description:
Hello everyone, on my client, whenever i click play, the coder made it so that his username and password show up.
How do i make it so nothing shows up where it says: Username and Password:
Thanks.

item.title: [Client] Someone's username and password show up! [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Danwasadog Danwasadog
item.description:
@Danwasadog wrote:

Open Client.java (Client Sided)

Search For: aString1173

You Will Find Something Like This:

aString1173 = “Mod Dan”;
aString1174 = “Password”;

Change Them To This:

aString1173 = “”;
aString1174 = “”;

Or Change To Your Password And Username

aString1173 = “xxxx”;
aString1174 = “yyyy”;

Replace xxxx With Your Username
Replace yyyy With Your Password

This Is For Almost Every Client, I Have Over 100 Different Clients And Its In Allmost All Of Them, Ive Been Programing Clients For 5 Months Or So Now.

Hope This Helped

Read full topic
item.source: [Client] Someone's username and password show up! [Help]

item.title: [Client] Someone's username and password show up! [Help]
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

what server is it? delta, pi, bluurs?

if delta/bluurs go into client.java client sided and search @cya@Username

When you find it…
Replace it with this

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "@cya@Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "@cya@Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@*" : ""), j);

Read full topic
